title: Demoted for inactivity when I was told i had 4 days left.
body:
I log into this account 2 days ago and it said I had 4 days left before I would be demoted for inactivity so today I logged in to play my ranked game and I got demoted? I don't get what happened but I have been demoted after being told I had a few days left.... This is kind of unfair to be honest that from 40lp d5 to 75lp plat 1.

Is there a mod that can change this so I can play my ranked game for the month I don't want to have to grind out back to d5 I don't have much time to play this time of year especially with the season ending in like a month

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like you were inactive for exactly a month before you were demoted. For high skill players, it's important to monitor and keep track of this outside the client, as the messages you got may have been old or delayed from a previous notification. Unfortunately, we cannot modify ranked tiers or standings, as a measure to prevent abuse of the system. 

Check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for complete details on ranked decay. Let me know if you have any questions.
thanks for the reply! it did say I had a few more days left but I guess its if u play the 5th u have to play the 5th next month... kinda lame but I got lucky with a win steak straight back to d5
